Document Approval Dates: Enter From and To dates or leave as the default dates.
DivPlt: Enter one or more codes (HighDiv/LowDiv/DivPlt) separated by commas without pressing the red arrow button or leave as 'All'. In addition, press the red arrow to open the pop up box. Select one or more codes (HighDiv/LowDiv/DivPlt) and press Send Pick.
Requisition Number: Enter a value(s) separated by a comma, in full or as a % wildcard value. Alternatively, leave as 'All'.
Plant Country: Select a value from the drop down list or leave as 'All'.
Approver RACFID: Enter a value(s) separated by a comma, in full or as a % wildcard value. Alternatively, leave as 'All'.
Approval Identifier: Select a value from the drop down list or leave as 'All'.
Approver CDSID: Enter a value(s) separated by a comma, in full or as a % wildcard value. Alternatively, leave as 'All'.
Doc Approval Status: Select a value from the drop down list or leave as 'All'.
Approver Name: Enter a value(s) separated by a comma, in full or as a % wildcard value. Alternatively, leave as 'All'.
Prj/Exp: Select a value from the drop down list or leave as 'All'.
Approver Title: Enter a value(s) separated by a comma, in full or as a % wildcard value. Alternatively, leave as 'All'.
Wildcard Options: AB% will select any value starting with AB
%AB will select any value ending with AB
%AB% will select any value containing AB
NOTE: It is possible to select criteria in the wildcard fields which do not match those selected in the drop down fields/pop up boxes. This will return a no data error message.
Click Submit after entering your selection or Reset All to clear the criteria.
